name: logitech-craft-vscode
author: David Idol
description: Control VSCode directly using your Logitech Craft keyboard

logitechCraft.leftTurn.description: The VSCode command to run when the crown is turned to the left one notch.

logitechCraft.rightTurn.description: The VSCode command to run when the crown is turned to the right one notch.

logitechCraft.crownTouch.description: The VSCode command to run when the crown is touched.

logitechCraft.crownRelease.description: The VSCode command to run when the crown is released.
